00015 int com_cp(int argc, char **argv) {
00016         // Definition of local variables;
00017         int o;
00018         char *source = NULL, *dest = NULL;
00019         int i_flag = 0, r_flag = 0, v_flag = 0;
00020 
00021         // Reseting getopt internal index;
00022         optind = 0;
00023 
00024         while ((o = getopt(argc, argv, "irRv")) != -1) {
00025         switch(o) {
00026                 case 'i':
00027                         i_flag = 1;
00028                  break;
00029                 case 'r':
00030                 case 'R':
00031                         r_flag = 1;
00032                 break;
00033                 case 'v':
00034                         v_flag = 1;
00035                 break;
00036                 case '?':
00037                 default:
00038                         abort();
00039                 }
00040         }
00041 
00042         if(argc < 3) {
00043                 fprintf(stderr, "Please enter SOURCE and DESTINATION.\n");
00044                 return -1;
00045         }
00046 
00047         source = argv[argc-2];
00048         dest = argv[argc-1];
00049 
00050         if(is_dir(source) && !is_dir(dest)) {
00051                 fprintf(stderr, "Cannot copy directory to file.\n");
00052                 return -1;
00053         }
00054 
00055         /* file to file case */
00056         if((!is_dir(source) && !is_dir(dest)) || (!is_dir(source) && is_dir(dest))) {
00057 
00058                 /* file to dir case */
00059                 if(!is_dir(source) && is_dir(dest)) {
00060                         if(dest[strlen(dest)-1] != '/')
00061                                 strcat(dest, "/");
00062                         strcat(dest, source);
00063                 }
00064 
00065                 if(i_flag) {
00066                         char ch;
00067 
00068                         printf("DESTINATION file already exists. Overwrite? (y/n): ");
00069                         ch = getchar();
00070                         if(toupper(ch) != 'Y') {
00071                                 return 1;
00072                         }
00073                 }
00074 
00075                 if(copy_file(source, dest)) {
00076                         if(v_flag)
00077                                 fprintf(stdout, "%s copied to %s\n", source, dest);
00078 
00079                         return 0;
00080                 }
00081 
00082                 return -1;
00083         } else
00084         if(is_dir(source) && is_dir(dest)) {
00085                 /* dir to dir case */
00086                 /*
00087                  * TODO: recursivity;
00088                  */
00089                 if(r_flag) printf("-r parameter has not yet been implemented.\n");
00090 
00091                 if(dest[strlen(dest)-1] != '/')
00092                         strcat(dest, "/");
00093                 strcat(dest, source);
00094 
00095                 if(i_flag && is_dir(dest)) {
00096                         char ch;
00097 
00098                         printf("DESTINATION file already exists. Overwrite? (y/n): ");
00099                         ch = getchar();
00100                         if(toupper(ch) != 'Y') {
00101                                 return 1;
00102                         }
00103                 }
00104 
00105                 if(make_dir(dest, S_IRWXU | S_IRWXG | S_IROTH | S_IXOTH)) {
00106                         if(v_flag)
00107                                 printf("%s copied to %s\n", source, dest);
00108                         return 0;
00109                 }
00110 
00111                 return -1;
00112         } else fprintf(stderr, "the universe is gonna implode\n");
00113 
00114         return 0;
00115 }
